article.Heading: Budget 2016: Budget & bad loans
article.Summary: In a special pre-Budget series, Ideas for India, Latha Venkatesh discusses what the Budget can do to improve the banking sector and thereby improve lending in the economy. Pratip Chaudhuri, Former Chairman of SBI, MR Umarji, Former Legal Advisor to the IBA & one of the authors of the Bankruptcy Code Panel and Rajat Bahl, Director, CRISIL Ratings.
article.Body:
In a special pre-Budget series, Ideas for India, Latha Venkatesh discusses what the Budget can do to improve the banking sector and thereby improve lending in the economy. The eminent panellists are Pratip Chaudhuri, Former Chairman of State Bank of India (SBI), MR Umarji, Former Legal Advisor to the IBA and one of the authors of the Bankruptcy Code Panel and Rajat Bahl, Director, CRISIL Ratings.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos...
